title: nenjinil niraindiDum
sahitya:
nenjinil niranidiDum ranjani selva niraivinai aLittiDum shrIranjani amba


anupallavi

  konjiDum kumaran maghizh guharanjani kOla nal amarndiDam vaLar shivaranjani
rI ga pa dha ga pA dha ga ri sa ri 


caraNam 1    sajjanar pOTriDum janaranjani jnAna sArAmAi viLangiDum mAraranjani
pOrguNa tyAga guha manOranjani mOha mazhai pozhiyum mEgharanjani
ri sa ni sa ri ga ma ga
    caraNam 2    shruti muDivAna shrutiranjani isai sura laya virivAna svararanjani
porundu mei padam tarum budharanjani aruL muttamudAgiya cittaranjani
ri ga ma pa dha ni pa dha ni dha pa ma ga ri sa
